detail_desc: Calf-length dress in a jacquard weave with a round neckline, opening with a covered button at the back of the neck and long, raglan balloon sleeves with narrow trims and a button at the cuffs. Seam at the waist with a double drawstring and narrow ties, and a flared skirt with a tier. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a small frilled collar with ties and a V-neck. Raglan sleeves with smocking and a frill at the cuffs.
Flared blouse in a patterned, crinkled weave with a small stand-up collar and gathered yoke. Buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Metal studs in various shapes and designs, some decorated with rhinestones. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.
Wide T-shirt dress in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the back, patch pockets on the front and ribbing around the neckline.

Single-breasted coat in recycled wool and recycled polyester with notch lapels. Chest pocket, diagonal welt side pockets and two inner pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.

Wide blouse in an airy cotton weave with a small stand-up collar, opening at the front and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Pin-tucks at the top and a decorative pompom trim around the yoke and down the front. Gently dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves with scalloped edges. Unlined.

Set with a top, leggings and hairband. Sleeveless top in woven fabric with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and flounced trim at the front that continues over the shoulders. Leggings and hairband in soft cotton jersey. Hairband with a bow at the front.
Coat in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels and no fasteners. Long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, discreet front pockets and a single back vent. Tape-trimmed inner seams. Unlined.
Shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and side and back pockets.
Bag decoration with a metal keyring, large faux fur pompom and imitation leather tassel. Length 12 cm.
Kids Exclusive. Trousers in soft, organic slub cotton jersey with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist, fake fly with decorative buttons, and side pockets.
Short soft jersey crêpe top in a narrow cut at the top with an opening and button at the back of the neck and scalloped edges around the armholes.

Wide jumper in a soft knit containing some wool. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit, leggings and hat in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Leggings with wide foldover ribbing at the waist.
Blouse in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck, lace yoke, small lace frill at the shoulders and an elasticated seam under the bust.
Padded jacket with front and back in soft faux fur. Detachable, lined faux fur hood, stand-up collar, zip at the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and flap front pockets. Lined.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Long T-shirt in jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.

Soft handbag in grained imitation leather with two handles and a zip at the top and an adjustable, detachable shoulder strap with carabiner hooks at both ends. Two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 13x25x29 cm.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.

Dress in an airy, lightly crinkled weave with a V-neck, concealed zip at the back, gentle gathers at the shoulders and long sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Asymmetric seam and flounce at the waist, and a wide, floaty skirt with a flounce at the hem. Longer at the back. Lined.
Jacquard-knit socks in various colours and designs.
Chino shorts in a washed cotton weave with a zip fly, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets. Regular fit.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Bikini briefs in organic cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.
Cropped top in patterned mesh with short puff sleeves. Elastication and frill trims at the shoulders and sleeves, draped pleats front and back, and wide smocking at the back. Lined.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim, zip down the front and a drawstring at the waist. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, inner ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined in pile.
Imitation leather trainers with a padded edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Block-coloured cardigan in soft cotton with stripes knitted in different knit styles. Buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan knitted in a soft mohair blend with a shawl collar, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and front pockets.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and covered elastication at the hems. Soft brushed inside.

Sleeveless dress in jersey made from a viscose blend with a sheen. Narrow, braided shoulder straps that cross at the back, a double-layered top with a braided trim, and an asymmetric hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short coat in woven fabric with a zip down the front, patch front pockets, shoulder pads, and a pleat at the back. Lined.
Fitted, long-sleeved lace nursing dress with a V-neck and wrapover at the top and a practical inner top for easier nursing access. Lined lower section.
Scarf in a soft jacquard weave with fringes on the short sides.

Playsuit in chiffon made from recycled polyester with covered buttons at the front, a deep, flounce-trimmed V-neck and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Seam under the bust and at the waist. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the sweatshirt is organic.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft slub-knit viscose blend with a lace trim at the hem and slits in the sides.
Short dress in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, side pockets, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved top in jersey crêpe with inset lace trims, a round neckline and a small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with a zip down the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard at the top. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Stylish, fitted top in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Fishnet socks with wide elastic at the top.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, wrapover hood, contrasting colour seams, embroidery at the front and a kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with side pockets, fake welt back pockets, a fake fly with a button and gently tapered legs. Wide jersey panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Cardigan in soft cotton jersey with buttons down the front, front pockets, ribbing around the neckline and hem, and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Cropped vest top in ribbed jersey with metal press-studs down the front.
Calf-length skirt in a jacquard weave with a high paper bag waist and wide, detachable tie belt. Side pockets and a concealed zip and slit at the back. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Jacket in satin with a slight sheen. Narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket with a patterned lining, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Fastening with one button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a double back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Pencil skirt in a stretch jacquard knit with a decorative knot detail at the front and a slit at the back. Unlined.
Underwired lace bra with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Fitted shirt in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Playsuit in a crêpe weave with a long skirt at the back and a V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover front. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Boxer briefs in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets, seams at the knees and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless dress in soft cotton jersey with embroidery at the top, sewn-on bows on the shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
Short-sleeved top in soft, printed jersey.
Fully lined bikini top with laser-cut scalloped edges. Underwired, moulded, padded cups that lift and shape, ties at the back of the neck and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs that finish just above the knees. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Wide jumper in sturdy, rib-knit wool with a turtle neck, low dropped shoulders and wide, rounded sleeves that taper to the cuffs. Close fitting at the hem.

Suit set with a jacket and trousers woven in a viscose blend, a cotton shirt and a matching bow tie. Jacket with buttons at the front and fake front pockets. Trousers with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a button, and fake side and back pockets. Shirt with buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Detachable, adjustable bow tie in satin with a plastic fastener at the back.
Fully lined sports bralette in fast-drying functional fabric. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Light support.
Short-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey.
Large sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Boxy-style jumper in a fluffy jacquard knit with a turtle neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless blouse in airy viscose with a collar, buttons down the front, chest pocket and tie-front hem.
Triangle bikini top with lined cups, removable inserts and narrow, adjustable straps. Gathered elastication with a small frill trim at the hem and a metal fastener at the back.
Scarf in a viscose weave with a floral print and raw, frayed edges. Size: 130x200 cm.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Pull-on shorts in lightweight, patterned cotton denim with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets.

Long, warm-lined jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and an adjustable tab and button at the sides of the hem. Partly lined in pile. The jacket is made partly from recycled cotton.
Sleeveless top in a viscose weave with a V-neck and spaghetti straps. Partly lined.
No-show socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elastication around the tops. The socks are designed to be hidden inside your shoes.
Sleeveless, fitted, calf-length dress in jersey with decorative gathers at one side.
